nodes.text: The MCR-100 Miniprobe was a type of small probe droid during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. Designed by the Shroud, it was an upgrade from the MCR-99 reconnaissance droid.
The MCR-100 Miniprobe appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic: Rise of the Hutt Cartel, as a reward for completing the macrobinoculars storyline.
